description: The Dalmation Bellflower is truly a remarkable sight. Its bright yellow blooms contrast against the deep green foliage, creating a striking display. The flowers, perennial in nature, bloom from late spring into summer, accompanying a wide variety of other flowering plants in the garden. Its beautiful blooms coupled with its low maintenance needs make this plant a must-have for gardeners of all skill level. And, since it's pet friendly, it's even a great choice for gardeners of the furry kind!
